duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide level 1 customer and technical support through inbound phone and email requests.
Identify, troubleshoot, document, and replicate simple to complex customer problems and resolve or escalate complex problems.
Apply existing technical skills and develop advanced skills using appropriate tools and equipment.
Carry out level 1 tasks such as password changes, user account creations, deletions, archiving, assisting with printers, software, and system issues.
Participate in the continuous improvement of Service Desk processes and communication with customers and IT teams.
Enter, track, and maintain incident tickets in the Service Now ticketing system.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
